name: Acceptance Criteria - Services located by Chorus and Delta prior to wokrs commencing
Frequency - Once for each work location
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Temporary Traffic Management to be set up on site prior to any works commencing
Acceptance Criteria - Temporary Traffic Management set up by qualified STMS according to approved plans
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Scalas to be done on subgrade
Acceptance Criteria - If scala test results lower than 3, add 100mm of compacted AP65
Verifying Document - Photos, Field testing document
Frequency - One lot of tests for each work location
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Clegg testing to be done on backfill
Acceptance Criteria - Clegg Impact Value to be greater than 25

Acceptance Criteria - Clegg Impact Value to be greater than 35
Verifying Document - Photos, Field testing document
